name: io.github.bethmaloney/rdl-mcp
description: Edit SSRS reports using AI - simple tools to read and modify RDL files

environmentVariables.description: Log level for the RDL MCP server (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR)
environmentVariables.name: RDL_MCP_LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariables.description: Path to log file for the RDL MCP server
environmentVariables.name: RDL_MCP_LOG_FILE
